amendment.description: Relative to authorization and appropriations extensions.

action.text: Amendment SA 4085 to the amendment of the House to the text of S. 1521 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 4085 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S11879-11882) Relative to authorization and appropriations extensions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4085 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Domenici.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4085 to the amendment of the House to the text of S. 1521 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
